quaver.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if your voice quavers, it shakes as you speak, especially because you are nervous or upset
quaver.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘It’s not true, ’ she said, in a quavering voice.
quaver.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a musical note which continues for an eighth of the length of a semibreve
quaver.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a shaking sound in your voice
